name: Mini Precision Pencil Trio
description:
The perfect pocket-sized kit for the holidays and beyond. The Mini Precision Pencil Trio includes two Precision Colour Pencil shades BARNA and NEUTRA, our new Precision Highlight Pencil in ORO, and a Precision Pencil Sharpener, enclosed in a limited edition washed-paper wallet.

ORO is a warm-champagne that can be used to highlight inner corners of eyes, brow bone, nose, used as a subtle shimmering eyeshadow, or to add soft shimmer on lips.

NEUTRA is warm dusty-rose that is the perfect lip shade, or can be used as blush or eyeshadow for a rosy wash of colour.

BARNA is a deep charcoal brown that can be used to create definition around the eyes and lips, or used as a contour.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Vegan & Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Precision Pencil Trio
description:
$84 value.

Inspired by warm vibrant tones, the Precision Pencil Trio includes three Precision Colour Pencils – MELEG, ROZSA and NEUTRA, and Precision Pencil Sharpener.

This trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. All can be used to create a pop of colour on eyes, or warm flush of colour on lips, or cheeks.

ROZSA is a vibrant rose-pink; an energetic boost to your everyday pink.

MELEG is a fire orange with red undertones, which brings a warmth to the lips, eyes and cheeks.

NEUTRA is our universal Neutral: a dusty rose with warm undertones.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

This trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. All can be used to create a pop of colour on eyes, or warm flush of colour on lips, or cheeks.

ROZSA is a vibrant rose-pink; an energetic boost to your everyday pink.

name: DAY TO NIGHT TRIO
description:
A trio for bright, smoldering eyes; these three products bring definition, light and shadow to the eyes. The Lash Tint Mascara defines and lengthens lashes, with Barna bringing further definition, and can be used to create a smoked out eye, while the Lustro Precision Colour Pencil brings light around the eyes. Layered together, or used individually, these products create multiple possibilities for day and night time looks.

Lash Tint Mascara is a light-weight, tubing, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, providing a clean, easy application and wear.

Made in Korea. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed to be applied wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

Made in Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

BARNA is a universal shade of brown with a rich-warm chocolate undertone and a hint of charcoal.

Made in Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Colour Kit Two
description:
$84 value.

Inspired by an artist’s tool kit and techniques, Colour Kit Two includes three Precision Colour Pencils – Notte, Bor and Fiore, and Precision Colour Sharpener.

Colour Kit Two’s trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. Notte creates shadow, while Fiore brings warm energy, and Bor, a rich burgundy, is the perfect universal shades for colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks.

NOTTE is an indigo, navy blue.

BOR is a rich burgundy wine.

FIORE is a vibrant, melon coral.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: Precision Pencil Duo
description:
$52 value.

Two of our creamy-matte Precision Colour Pencil Shades for eyes, lips and cheeks.

Pick between four different pencil combinations, including the shades:

VOROS, our timeless vibrant red for the perfect statement lip, bold red liner, or rosy flush of colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks.

NEUTRA, our signature, universal neutral, created to compliment natural lip tones. Use to define lip shape, as lip colour, blush, or eyeshadow or liner.

BARNA, a deep charcoal brown shade that can be used to define eyes and create dimension on lips. This shade can also be used as contour pencil.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed for application wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

The Precision Colour Pencil is inspired by the classic artist’s tool, a wooden pencil. A pencil is the ideal format for added definition on eyes and lips, and our blendable formula allows for versatile application on all areas of the face.

Made it Italy.

Cruelty Free & Vegan.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Colour Kit One
description:
$114 value.

Inspired by an artist’s tool kit and techniques, Colour Kit One includes three Precision Colour Pencils – Voros, Barna and Lustro, the Tapered Multi-Brush, and Precision Colour Sharpener, packaged in a reusable washed-paper case.

Colour Kit One’s trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. Barna creates shadow, while Lustro brings light, and Voros, a true red, gives a timeless, seasonless pop of colour.

Tapered Multi-Brush is designed to buff and blend colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks, and create diffused lines, with soft, synthetic fibre bristles, at a medium density.

BARNA is a universal shade of brown with a rich-warm chocolate undertone and a hint of charcoal.

LUSTRO is a champagne, satin-pearl, highlighting pencil.

VOROS is a universal vibrant, true red.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: BRIGHT EYED DUO
description:
$44 value.

The perfect daily duo to create an eye-opening effect. The Lash Tint Mascara defines and lengthens lashes, while Lustro Precision Colour Pencil can be used to create light around the eyes.

Lash Tint Mascara is a light-weight, tubing, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, providing a clean, easy application and wear.

Made in Korea. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed to be applied wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

The Precision Colour Pencil is inspired by the classic artist’s tool, a wooden pencil. A pencil is the ideal format for added definition on eyes and lips, and our blendable formula allows for versatile application on all areas of the face.

Made in Italy and Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
